name: BOOMINTON - Team 2
description:
Welcome to BOOMINTON, a brand new explosive sport to blow your mind ! BOOMINTON was made in a 3.5 days jam in a PS1 like game theme and as a constraint the word "TNT".

You can download it bellow.

It's a 1vs1 Player versus Player contest where you have to throw away the TNT that is coming to your side. A player wins the game after scoring 5 points, a point is gained when an ennemy zone is destroyed by throwing the TNT to it.

When an area of the field is hit twice by an explosion, it is destroyed and the opponent scores 1 point. He will still be able to aim at it but it is no longer possible for him to use this area to score points.

A player can always move freely on a destroyed area of his field.

When a TNT lands in a destroyed area, it will half heal one of your own destroyed area.

Playable with controller only.

Dualshock :
Movements - Direction pad (not joysticks)
Damped shot - Square
Regular shot - Cross
Long shot - Circle

Xbox controller :
Movements - Direction pad (not joysticks)
Damped shot - X
Regular shot - A
Long shot - B

Developped by : Jules FRITZ • Lucas ESPOSITO • Léo LE LANN

Designed : Raphaël FIGUESTER • Pierre-Louis DULIEU

Graphics by : Pauline ROY • Inès ROUSSIES

Produced by : Théophile COURATIER
